name: Brutal Christmas
description:
Wreck in the houses, smash doors, smash windows, shoot the citizens with fireworks - all this in necessary to bring holiday in this little town. 

Your only purpose is to fill ho-ho-meter with the citizens' «joy». Use any available methods to do it. Make more chaos.

Controls:
  • <W,A,S,D, Space> - Movement;
  • <F> - Leg punch;
  • <E> - Equip;
  • <LMB> - USE;
  • <Mouse Wheel> - change equip slot
Team:
  • @gishadev - developer/programmer;
  • @doumuten - artist.

Music: Joy to the World by Mid-Air Machine
